stable103/librarian.bookCollect/accept: Sure, I guess I can look for some new books.
stable103/librarian.bookCollect/accepted: Outsanding ! I just can't wait ! I suppose around 30 new books would be enough. Thank you !
stable103/librarian.bookCollect/askAboutAuthors: What do you mean ? We have plenty of authors in this stable, there's a few new books popping up every year.
stable103/librarian.bookCollect/brought:
He quickly scan through the titles

Oh wow ! Outsanding ! Thank you so much, this is really going to be refreshing ! Thank you so much !
stable103/librarian.bookCollect/intro: Wait a minute. You know, at some point, it gets boring reading the same books again and again. But since you're going to go outside, I was wondering… would you mind keeping an eye out for new books to add to our collection ?
stable103/librarian.bookCollect/sarcasm: Yeah, sure, I'm going to break my back carrying fictions and cookbooks for the bookworms. Get a life, nerd.
stable103/librarian.bookCollect/sarcasmed: You don't have to be an ass about it…
stable103/librarian.bookCollect/stable-authors: Authors, you think they deserve the title ? Always the same old theme, biting their own tails. I want something fresh and exciting, uncharted universes, provocative ideas ! The amateurs from the stable aren't going to satisfy the thirst of a true bookworm…
stable103/librarian.bringBooks: I have those new books you wanted.
